page.title: 02Thirsk and Sowerby continued
page.content: {Schools:}Thirsk Secondary, Thirsk C.P. Sowerby C.P., All Saints R.C. Primary. {Famous People connected with Thirsk:} James Herriot(vet and author), William Foggitt(Weatherman), Thomas Lord (founder of Lord's Cricket Ground),George McCauly(Cricketer), Kathleen Rhodes(authoress) {Transport Facilities:}Regular buses to and from Northallerton, York, Ripon, Helmesley.Buses stop in Market Square. British Rail Station(York - Edinburgh) {Facilities and Leisure Amenities:} Hospital,Fire Station,Police Station, Library,Swimming Pool,Cinema,Bingo Hall,Racecourse,Folk Museum,Town Hall. {Clubs and Societies:}Squash,Swimming, Hockey,Football,Cricket,Tennis,Bowls, Angling,Youth Clubs,Thirsk Singers, W.I.,Mothers Union,Round Table,Thirsk Amateurs(Dramatic Society),Museum Society,Natural History Society.
